name: CourtRoom
overview: For aspiring Grace Van Owens (or Victor Sifuentes), Courtroom is a simulation of a jury trial. Prosecute or defend a docket of twelve cases, ranging from Arson to Tax Evasion, against a friend or your computer. A crash course on rules of evidence and judicial procedure is presented in the manual for legal neophytes. The graphics are crude and there is no sound, but your quid pro quo for pulling up with these minor irritations is an entertaining, educational jaunt into our jurisprudence system. Verdict: An original, well implemented concept. Court adjourned.
